text:
Alice: We're Alice and Sarah
from Dough Re Mi.

And we use our voices
to make sweet treats
to support those most in need.
We met in Chinese dance.

Through dance class,
we learned a little bit more

about our culture
and our heritage.
When COVID-19 was starting up,

we were inspired
by people around us

who were taking
great initiatives,
and we started Dough Re Mi

as a way
to help the community.

Dough Re Mi is
a cookie delivery company,

and 80% of our proceeds
go to charity.

Alice: Starting, we definitely
had our challenges.

One time we tried this
strawberry cheesecake cookie,

but it turned out
to be a soggy mess.

I'm really proud of them
because they showed

their strong voice
to the community.

It's so important
to use your voice

because everything
you have to say matters.

No matter how small or big,
the actions you take...

Can make a change
in the world.
( speaking Mandarin )
Both: Use your voice.
